name: Lost in travel
description:
Español:

En un mundo Post-apocaliptico, un valiente hombre, tendrá que explorar lugares tenebrosos para encontrar herramientas y reparar su aberiada camioneta.

El viaje se vuelve dificil cuando te pierdes...

English:

In a Post-Apocalypical world, a rude man needs to explore scary places and find tools to repare his broken truck.

The travel becames hard when you get lost...

Lost in travel @galfre.v

Assets: https://fartfish.itch.io/zombie-game-asset-pack!
Assets: https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-dungeon-tileset!

Developed by @Galfre.v (instagram)

For LuisCanary 2 GameJam.
